projects.title: Contest - Business game Cesim
projects.description:
Along with three other students, we participated in a business game over a month. The topic was about a beverage company that offered 6 products and can operate in two markets. There was two universe of 10 teams each as emlyon, dauphine or ieseg.

Results:
- 1st of our universe
- 2nd of all teams
- Qualified for the London finals in june 2021

projects.title: Contest - Business Creation Project
projects.description:
As part of my emlyon studies, I have the opportunity to participate in a business creation competition. A complete project, from idea generation to financing:
- Idea generation
- Market research
- Field study (co-creation)
- Marketing study
- Economic viability
- Supply chain
- Finance

We then created DOMA Tech, a concierge service dedicated to private practitioners, especially dentists. The advantages of our product :
- 1st concierge service dedicated to private practitioners in France.
- Saves time for practitioners
- Quality and hygiene-oriented services
- A comparator of the products of the various suppliers and central purchasing agencies in the field.

Our goal is to simplify the practitioner's work and optimize costs.

Project carried out with seriousness and envy, we plan to create DOMA Tech.

projects.title: Research Project - Design Thinking, a source of strategy in the company?
projects.description:
We are 5 students carrying out a study on Design Thinking. We are then looking to carry out a sociological/scientific review focused on the impact that this concept can have in the strategy of companies.

We were able to carry out an in-depth study on the subject. Indeed, we had the chance to interview specialists from all over the world. People who gave us their time to share their experience and vision of Design Thinking. These included specialist consultants, professors from leading universities (Stanford) and people who apply this model in their companies.

We are open to all contacts with people like us who are interested in this subject.

profile_positions.description:
As part of a partnership between the United Nations and ESADE Business School (Capstone Project),  I am currently working on a predictive analytics project as part of the United Nation Field Remote Infrastructure Management (FRIM) program team.

The ongoing project consists of facilitating services improvement, staff well-being, efficient use of resources, environmental impact reduction, anomaly detection and predictive maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Data Analyst (Partnership Program)

profile_positions.description:
Company sold in October 2020.

OSTONE offers you two real affordable, disposable and ecological alternatives to plastic straw while correcting the lack of resistance of the paper straw.

Our two solutions:
- Resistant fibers straw: 1 hour of resistance (water at 100°C) and 100% biodegradable.
- Mineral paper straw: 2 hours of resistance (water at 100°C) and 90% biodegradable.

The advantages of OSTONE straws:
- Water resistant 100°C : +1 hour
- Do not alter the taste of the drink
- Recyclable / Biodegradable
- Cost-effective solutions
- SGS 9001, Food Grade FDA certified and FSC-certified forests

My role:
- Managed financial strategy: budget, forecast, performance, accounting, pricing and cost control
- In charge of logistic and supply chain activities: stock and order management, carrier relations and customs
- Managed sales activities in Europe, business development : prospecting, customer follow-up, participation in trade fairs, competitions and events
- Led Business plan creation, offer development, market study, positioning and targeting
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & Managing director

profile_positions.description:
I participate in the development of the Finance Strategy and Growth Drivers team, which covers the financial monitoring of global brands, Revenue Growth Management, innovation projects and the optimization of advertising & promotion investments and commercial cooperation.

My missions:
- Monitored strategic plan, budget and performance review processes
- Carried out brand P&L and profitability analysis,
- Qualified of the innovation portfolio and analysis of project profitability,
- Financial monitoring of key international accounts, and Revenue Growth Management approach,
- Analysis of the efficiency of advertising and promotional investments (ROI),
- Participated in the evolution and optimization of reporting tools in accordance with business and organizational developments,
- Improved and developed existing tools through use of a digital reporting tool (Power BI)
- Conducted analyses to respond to specific requests or ad hoc studies.
profile_positions.title: Financial Controller Strategy and Growth Drivers

profile_positions.description:
I participated in the construction and development of the Growth Markets. This department of EY offers services to companies of intermediate sizes.

My missions:
- Collaborated with 12 partners, leaders, leaders in private equity, merger & acquisition, listed companies & inbound
- Elaborated the EY growth market's go-to-market strategy and positioning
- Conducted micro analysis: accounts / market performance
- Carrying out macro and competition analysis: trends, ecosystem, news
- Coordinated strategic EMEIA projects
- Supervised decision-making meetings (Executive Committee)
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Engel & Völkers is a German multinational, world leader in real estate brokerage companies.

My mission is oriented around business and marketing functions.
- Conducted market analysis & project management
- Registration of real estate brokerage operations
- Promoted & monitored 14 real estate agents
profile_positions.title: Business Developer

profile_positions.description:
The BBA Junior Consulting of emlyon Business School is a student micro company which makes market studies.

As Vice-president, my tasks were:
- Leading a team of 9 people: recruitment, follow-up, team building
- Developing a portfolio of 11 customers
- Sales Prospecting
- Monitoring of financial activities

Results:
+ 7 customers in 2017
+ 200% of turnover in 2017
profile_positions.title: Vice president

profile_positions.description:
AllForOne is a championship based on the game Overwatch create by Olympe (editor : Blizzard). Olympe is a start-up reuniting 3 actors of the e-gaming (players, teams, events) through an internet platform.

My tasks :
- Developing the Business Strategy
- Coordinating the database
- Sales prospecting
- Creating Business documents (flyers, charters, website, etc.)
- Elaborating partnership with student organizations
profile_positions.title: Sales manager B2B

volunteer_experiences.description: I was mentoring students by answering their doubts and questions concerning their orientation.

For 2 years, I was part of the youth department councillor of my department. This programme is composed of 100 students. We worked on topics related to culture, sport, environment, education, disability and harassment.

Our main project was to create an awareness campaign for students on harassment issues.

For 2 years, I was part of the youth city councillor of Valdahon, my home city. This program is composed of a small dozen students. We worked on topics of urban planning, environment and education.

Our main project was to raise funds for an orphanage in Haity that was destroyed in the earthquake in 2010.
